mapper.select:
select sum(waybillCount) as waybillSum,sum(allFee) as amountSum from (
) t

select w.id as id,w.alloc_centre_id as allocCentreId,w.alloc_centre as allocCentre,w.region_id as regionId,w.region as region, w.customer_name as customerName,w.merchant_status as merchantStatus,w.status as status,w.curr_user as currUser,w.curr_user_id as currUserId from mms_outer_customer w inner join sb_customer c ON w.customer_name = c.customer_account inner join sb_waybill b ON b.shipper_customer_id = c.id where w.customer_name = #{name}
